QuestData.Title: A More Civilized Way
QuestData.Description:
Ah, $p.
I have a matter to discuss with you. But not here.
<Nadjia eyes the other denizens of Keeper's Respite suspiciously.>
Meet me where the road enters Korthia from the Maw and I will explain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Nadjia near the road leading into Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText: Your form still needs work. Thank you, for taking time out of our unending campaign to duel. We must remember, even in times of great struggle, to do things that bring us joy.
